sn_aia_tool.description: This tool retrieves a list of branches from a specified GitHub repository using inputs such as the repository owner, repository name, branch protection filter (true, false, true/false or empty string), and the number of records to retrieve (rounded up to the nearest multiple of 30). If the branch protection filter is not provided, it defaults to an empty value. If the owner or repository value is missing, the user will be prompted to provide it. The output includes branch details such as the name, latest commit SHA, and protection status. A GitHub connection with credentials is required. Production use of this tool requires a subscriptionâ€”refer to ServiceNow IntegrationHub licensing for details.
sn_aia_tool.name: Look up Branches Stream
